text: The 1998–99 season was Clydebank's thirty-third season in the Scottish Football League. They competed in the Scottish First Division where they finished 7th. They also competed in the Scottish League Cup and Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division 1=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Round ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
